name: Hungry Holly
description:
Holly is hungry, catch the red tomatoes to eat them. Don't let any tomatoes hit the ground. You don't want to eat the green tomatoes, so throw a rock at them instead. Avoid the falling rocks.

Move left/right with arrow keys or A/D.
Left mouse click or space bar to throw.

You lose if you miss 10 tomatoes, or if you are hit by 10 rocks.
